column4: Why does my firefox crash every now and then when I play a youtube video?
it probably has something to do with what flash player you're using
what flash are you using right now?
the latest version
are you using gnash or the official flash player?
I downloaded it yesterday because I couldn't play youtube and amarok at same time, now I can do that but occasionaly firefox crashes when I click a flash link
I'm using the nonfree one
i uninstalled the rest and installed macromedia flashplayer
haven't had one problem since getting rid of the rest of the swf players and using macromedia flash
it's in the repos?
that's the one I'm using
easier than that, can get it from add/remove :-p
it is huh....are the rest of your swf players uninstalled?
you should check to see in firefox 3's plugins if there's others there
sometimes even if the right one is there it uses another on firefox 3 Mo0oSaH
I can't quite remember the command to check the installed flash players
mind helping me out?
i don't know the command, honestly, but if you go to system tools and synaptic and search swf it will show them all
did you find synaptic and the swf players?
looking for them now
alright, might take a few minutes Mo0oSaH  there's a lot and if you've been trying for a while might have several installed
that's the only one I have installed
are you using 32 or 64 bit? i'm using 64 and haven't used 32 bit ubuntu
